meanings.definition: A type of tapestry or textile featuring a background covered with small flowers and plants.
meanings.sent1: The millefleur tapestry hung beautifully on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress with a lovely millefleur pattern.
meanings.sent3: The millefleur fabric seemed to bloom under the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her room was transformed into a millefleur garden with the new curtains.
meanings.sent5: The intricate millefleur design added a touch of nature to the room.

meanings.definition: A pattern or design featuring a background covered with small flowers and plants.
meanings.sent1: The tablecloth had a delicate millefleur motif.
meanings.sent2: The wallpaper in the room had a charming millefleur print.
meanings.sent3: The millefleur design on the pillow made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked like a millefleur carpet from above.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a millefleur masterpiece on the canvas.
